name: CATARSIS: The Game
description:
CATARSIS: The Game

It’s a Post-apocalyptic game, based on 2D fighting mechanics with side scroll style line, like a beat em up, its difficult is on the enemies, they are stronger than you and they have advantages over you since they can reappear, that means that after you have passed an area they will reappear when you return.

Controls Main Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Run - Shift
  • Roll - Space
  • Jump - UP / W 

Change System -  Q

Shooting System
  • Shoot - LEFT CLICK
  • Aim - RIGHT CLICK
  • Reload - R
Fighting System
  • Punch - LEFT CLICK
  • Looking - RIGHT CLICK
Credits!
  • José Pereira(@Jocrod1) - Team leader / Programmer.
  • Raimon Koudsi(@Raimonkoudsi) - Programmer.
  • Carlos Edesio(@SelkerPixel) - Artist.
  • Mirla Montaño(@mirlu_exe) - Artist.
  • Nicolas Donoso(@Sir_Floppa) - Sound Designer.
  • Robert Nekrasov - Composer.

Check out the source code!
